item.title: Django: Save Unknown Object in Database
item.description: Implementing the procedures mentioned here in a production system may cause security issues in the future. I wrote this article as a hack. Suppose you are dealing with a poorly written API, which returns different type of objects at different scenarios. For example, sometimes it returns a string(ie. abcd), sometimes it returns a list(ie.
